question_en: How many articles are there in the Constitution of Nepal 2072?
question_np: नेपालको संविधान २०७२ मा कुन धारामा खाद्य सम्बन्धी हकको व्यवस्था गरिएको छ?

question_en: How many districts are there in Bagmati Pradesh?
question_np: बागमती प्रदेशमा जम्मा कति जिल्ला रहेका छन्?

question_en: Who is the current Secretary General of SAARC (South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation)?
question_np: सार्क (दक्षिण एशियाली क्षेत्रीय सहयोग संगठन) को वर्तमान महासचिवको जिम्मेवारी कसले बहन गरिरहेका छन्?

question_en: How many permanent members are there in the UN Security Council?
question_np: संयुक्त राष्ट्र सङ्घीय सुरक्षा परिषद् (UN Security Council) मा कति सदस्य रहन्छन्?

question_en: Which team won the Nepal Premier League (NPL season 2: Cricket 20/20 tournament)?
question_np: दोस्रो नेपाल प्रिमियर लिग (Nepal Premier League-NPL season 2: Cricket 20/20 tournament) कसले जित्यो?

question_en: Which is the most important record in the history of Nepal?
question_np: अति महत्वपूर्ण अभिलेख कति समयसम्म सुरक्षित राख्नु पर्छ?

question_en: Which is the most popular social media platform for sharing photos?
question_np: सामाजिक सञ्जालमा नयाँ तेहायको कुन प्रविधि हो?

question_en: What is the capital city of Nepal?
question_np: नेपालको राजधानी शहर कुन हो?

question_en: When was the Constitution of Nepal 2072 promulgated?
question_np: नेपालको संविधान २०७२ कहिले जारी भएको थियो?

question_en: How many provinces are there in Nepal according to the Constitution 2072?
question_np: संविधान २०७२ अनुसार नेपालमा कति प्रदेश छन्?

question_en: Who is known as the 'Father of Education' in Nepal?
question_np: नेपालमा 'शिक्षाको पिता' को रूपमा कसलाई चिनिन्छ?

question_en: What is the highest mountain peak in the world located in Nepal?
question_np: नेपालमा अवस्थित विश्वको सबैभन्दा अग्लो हिमाल कुन हो?

question_en: Which river is the longest in Nepal?
question_np: नेपालको सबैभन्दा लामो नदी कुन हो?

question_en: Who was the first President of Nepal?
question_np: नेपालको पहिलो राष्ट्रपति को हुनुहुन्थ्यो?

question_np: नेपालको राष्ट्रिय फूल कुन हो?

question_en: In which year did Nepal become a Federal Democratic Republic?
question_np: नेपाल कुन वर्षमा संघीय लोकतान्त्रिक गणतन्त्र भयो?

question_en: Who wrote the National Anthem of Nepal?
question_np: नेपालको राष्ट्रिय गान कसले लेखेका हुन्?

question_en: What is the total area of Nepal?
question_np: नेपालको कुल क्षेत्रफल कति हो?

question_en: Which is the largest district of Nepal by area?

question_en: Who unified Nepal?
question_np: नेपाललाई एकीकरण गर्ने व्यक्ति को हुन्?
